channel.title: How Do I Put Exion Online?
channel.description: Hi, I'm using Exion as my base, and I have portforwarded (i have netgear n300 or something like that), anyway, I did that, and then I got no-ip, put the ip in client.java on the CLIENT side. is that all i do..? It just doesn't seem to work, I tried to log on on my other computer, with no luck D:

item.title: How Do I Put Exion Online?
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Maybe your firewall is blocking all connections, configure your firewall.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Put Exion Online?

item.title: How Do I Put Exion Online?
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Hi, I’m using Exion as my base, and I have portforwarded (i have netgear n300 or something like that), anyway, I did that, and then I got no-ip, put the ip in client.java on the CLIENT side.
is that all i do…?
It just doesn’t seem to work, I tried to log on on my other computer, with no luck D:

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Put Exion Online?
